data.title: Power & Energy Masters
data.text:
Basic Package includes:

• advertisement page in the Digital Proceedings

• presentation of an advertisement or a logo on a LED poster within exhibition spaces

• participation for one representative without the participation fee (i.e. the participation fee is included)

• presenting of the company and/or its logo in the Conference materials: event announcements on the Conference web page, in a Newsletter that is sent to 14 000 e-mails, in the Digital Proceedings and in a review on the event in the EGE technical magazine that will be published after the Conference.

Price: 700,00 EUR.

Beside the Basic Package, it includes:

• a thematic lecture (a presentation of a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) in the time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

or

• a targeted thematic one-on-one talk (about a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) between a representative of Co-organizer and Organizer, with an option of showing a shorter film or an animation or a shorter presentation in the background, in the total time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

• a page in the Digital Proceedings with a title and summary of the presentation (lecture or targeted thematic interview) along with the basic data about presenter (lecturer or participant of the interview).

Price: 1.100,00 EUR.

Beside the Basic Package, it includes:

• a thematic lecture (a presentation of a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) in the time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

or

• a targeted thematic one-on-one talk (about a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) between a representative of Co-organizer and Organizer, with an option of showing a shorter film or an animation or a shorter presentation in the background, in the total time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

• a page in the Digital Proceedings with a title and summary of the presentation (lecture or targeted thematic interview) along with the basic data about presenter (lecturer or participant of the interview)

• an exhibition on an exhibition space that is located next to the conference hall, when each exhibition unit is equipped with a table and two chairs, where is possible to present products, solutions, services, to distribute brochures and catalogues, etc.

Price: 1.400,00 EUR.

Beside the Basic Package, it includes:

• a thematic lecture (a presentation of a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) in the time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

or

• a targeted thematic one-on-one talk (about a company, its solutions, products, services, experience, implemented projects, references, etc.) between a representative of Co-organizer and Organizer, with an option of showing a shorter film or an animation or a shorter presentation in the background, in the total time up to 15 minutes within the Conference programme

or

• an exhibition on an exhibition space that is located next to the conference hall, when each exhibition unit is equipped with a table and two chairs, where is possible to present products, solutions, services, to distribute brochures and catalogues, etc.

• a page in the Digital Proceedings with a title and summary of the presentation (lecture or targeted thematic interview) along with the basic data about presenter (lecturer or participant of the interview)

• a display of a Special Co-organizer logo on the participants accrediations and its display as as 'Special Co-organizer' in all Conference materials

• additional participation fee (i.e. two participation fees).

Price: 1.900,00 EUR.

Beside the Basic Package, it includes:

• refreshment (coffee, juice, water, pastries, etc.) during the coffee break, that will be organized by the Organizer on behalf of the Co-organizer

• display of the Co-organizer’s logo and other promotional materials in the Coffee Break room

• announcement of the Coffee Break and display of the Co-organizer’s logo in the Conference Programme as well as on the Conference web page, in the Coffee Break room and on the conference room screen

• additional participation fee (i.e. two participation fees).

Price: 2.200,00 EUR.

Beside the Basic Package, it includes:

• refreshment (coffee, juice, water, pastries, etc.) during the coffee break, that will be organized by the Organizer on behalf of the Co-organizer

• display of the Co-organizer’s logo and other promotional materials in the Coffee Break room

• announcement of the Coffee Break and display of the Co-organizer’s logo in the Conference Programme as well as on the Conference web page, in the Coffee Break room and on the conference room screen

• an exhibition on an exhibition space that is located next to the conference hall, when each exhibition unit is equipped with a table and two chairs, where is possible to present products, solutions, services, to distribute brochures and catalogues, etc.

• additional participation fee (i.e. two participation fees).

Price: 2.700,00 EUR.

Other forms and options for co-organization are as follows.

DIGITAL PLUS

Digital plus is an additional marketing offer in addition to individual Co-organizers packages at the Conferences. It is an offer for additional packages as follows.

Digital Plus MINI

• a thematic section or a round table Co-organizer and such mentioning in all Conference materials

• post on social media of ENERGETIKA MARKETING company (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram)

• price: 130,00 EUR

Digital Plus OPTI

• a thematic section or a round table Co-organizer and such mentioning in all Conference materials

• post on social media of ENERGETIKA MARKETING company (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram), PR text on the www.energetika-net.com portal and mentioning in a report about the Conference on the portal and in the EGE magazine after the Conference

• price: 250,00 EUR

Digital Plus MAXI

• a thematic section or a round table Co-organizer and such mentioning in all Conference materials

• two posts on social media of ENERGETIKA MARKETING company (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram), of which one is dedicated to the Co-organizer, post on Instagram and Facebook (IG + FB story), PR text on the www.energetika-net.com portal (additional possibility: 'native' announcement or mentioning), sending in a newsletter on 14 000 addresses i mentioning in a 'native' report about the Conference on the portal and in the EGE magazine after the Conference

• price: 520,00 EUR.

SPECIAL CONFERENCE PATRON

We also offer marketing packages for Special Conference Patrons, i.e. for companies and institutions that want to contribute to the organization by promoting their products and/or services that are not necessarily related to the Conference topics.

The organizer will specially arrange the area (a 'corner' with highlighted products or services of the Special Patron and an advertising section that will be clearly highlighted. Additional visibility is achieved with articles that are optimized for search engines (SEO optimizing) on the www.energetika-net.com portal and in EGE magazine digital issue, on ENERGETIKA MARKETING company social networks channels (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram) and sending in a newsletter on 14 000 addresses.

SPECIAL PATRON package includes:

• two social media posts (announcement and live mentioning)

• text on Instagram and Facebook (IG + FB story) live

• announcement PR text on the www.energetika-net.com portal

• mentioning in a newsletter

• publishing of a native text after the Conference.

Materials that are needed for prepatation:

• a client logo

• copyrighted photos.

Price and total package concept is to be agreed separately with the Organizer.
